source.sqlReaderQuery:
--TRUNCATE the table and INSERT the data FROM main table
TRUNCATE table RoopaETPreData;
INSERT into RoopaETPreData
SELECT [State]
      ,[County]
,(CASE WHEN len(cast(Plan_ID as varchar(50)))='3' and left(cast(Plan_ID as varchar(50)),1)='8' THEN 'Group MA Plans' ELSE 'Individual MA Plans' END)IndGroupPlans,
(CASE WHEN ((LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='H' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'R')) AND [Offers_Part_D]='Yes' THEN 'MA-PD'
WHEN ((LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='H' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'R')) AND [Offers_Part_D]='No' THEN 'MA (without drugs)'
WHEN (LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='E' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'S') THEN 'PDP' END) as MAPDP
      ,[Special_Needs_Plan_Type] as [SNP]
      ,[Plan_Type] as [PlanType]
      ,[Plan_Name] as [PlanName]
      ,[Key_Cp_Id] as [BidId]
      ,[Parent_Organization] as [OrganizationName]
      ,[Year]
      ,[Month] as [MonthName]
      ,[Enrollments]
      ,[ma_eligibles] as [MAEligibles]
      ,[Stability_Index] as [StabilityIndex]
	  --,'Yes' as [Prediction] 
      ,'No' as [Prediction] 
      ,[EGHP]
      ,[FIPS_State_County_Code]
      ,[Offers_Part_D]
      ,[Other Dual Full Medicaid Benefit] as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,[Plan_ID]
      ,[QDWI]
      ,[QI]
      ,[QMB only] as [QMB_Only]
      ,[QMB plus Full Medicaid Benefits] as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SLMB only] as [SLMB_only]
      ,[SLMB plus Full Medicaid Benefits] as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SNP_Eligibles]
      ,[SNP_Plan]
      ,[SSA_State_County_Code]
      ,[Contract_ID],null,null,null,null,null,null,null
	  ,[Status]
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[Trends_CW_withpredictions];
  
 
DELETE FROM RoopaETPreData WHERE monthname='';
  
UPDATE a SET  a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsOrganization b ON a.OrganizationName = b.OrganizationName;

--SELECT *  FROM RoopaETPreData where organizationid is null;

INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsOrganization
SELECT distinct OrganizationName FROM RoopaETPreData where organizationid is null
order by OrganizationName;

UPDATE a SET  a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsOrganization b ON a.OrganizationName = b.OrganizationName
where a.OrganizationID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.StateID=b.StateID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsState b ON a.State = b.State;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where stateid is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.CountyID=b.CountyID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsCounty b ON a.County = b.County;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where CountyID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsIndGroupPlans b ON a.IndGroupPlans = b.IndGroupPlans;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where IndGroupPlansID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.MAPDPID=b.MAPDPID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsMAPDP b ON a.MAPDP = b.MAPDP;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where MAPDPID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.SNPID=b.SNPID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSNP b ON a.SNP = b.SNP;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where SNPID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsPlanType b ON a.PlanType = b.PlanType;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where PlanTypeID is null;

--Get data for filters
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsFilters;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsFilters
SELECT distinct 
      [OrganizationID]
      ,[StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
 
 --get data for filters
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters
SELECT distinct 
      [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
  
--Get Data for EnrollmentTrendsData
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsData;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsData
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]  
	  ,[OrganizationID]
	  ,[PlanName]
      ,[BidId]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[Enrollments]
	  ,[MAEligibles]
      ,[StabilityIndex]
      ,[Prediction]
      ,[EGHP]
      ,[FIPS_State_County_Code]
      ,[Offers_Part_D]
      ,[Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,[Plan_ID]
      ,[QDWI]
      ,[QI]
      ,[QMB_Only]
      ,[QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SLMB_only]
      ,[SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SNP_Eligibles]
      ,[SNP_Plan]
      ,[SSA_State_County_Code]
      ,[Contract_ID],null,null
	  ,[Status]

  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
  
  
--alter table  [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData] add MonthNumber int
--alter table  [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData] add MonthYear int

update EnrollmentTrendsData set monthnumber=charindex(left([MonthName],3),'JAN FEB MAR APR MAY JUN JUL AUG SEP OCT NOV DEC')/4+1;
update EnrollmentTrendsData set monthyear=CONVERT(char(6), DATEFROMPARTS(year, monthnumber, 1), 112);

-- to replace 0 with nulls as it disturbs the average of eligibles
UPDATE EnrollmentTrendsData SET MAEligibles = CASE WHEN MAEligibles=0 THEN NULL ELSE MAEligibles END;

TRUNCATE table [ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction];
INSERT into [ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction]
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,null as FilterID
	  ,[Status]
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where prediction='No'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]
	  ,[Status]
	   order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction];

UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


INSERT into ETDFilterLevelWithPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,null as FilterID
	  ,[Status]
	  
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where prediction='Yes'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]
	  ,[Status]
	   order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction];

	  UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDFilterLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;

	  /****** Script for SELECTTopNRows command FROM SSMS  ******/
TRUNCATE table ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction;
INSERT into ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,count(distinct BidId) as NoOfPlans,
	  null as FilterID,
	  null as SubFilterID
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where Prediction='No'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
	  order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
	  ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction];


UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.PKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsFilters b ON 
a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID and a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


UPDATE a SET  a.SubFilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


INSERT into ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,count(distinct BidId) as NoOfPlans,
	  null as FilterID,
	  null as SubFilterID
  FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where Prediction='Yes'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
	  order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
	  ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction];


UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.PKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsFilters b ON 
a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID and a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


UPDATE a SET  a.SubFilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;



TRUNCATE table [ETDPlans];
INSERT into  [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[ETDPlans]
SELECT [MonthYear],[OrganizationID],count(distinct BidId) [NoOfplans]
FROM EnrollmentTrendsData 
GROUP BY [MonthYear],[OrganizationID];
	   
TRUNCATE table [EnrollmentTrendsMonthYear];
INSERT into [EnrollmentTrendsMonthYear]
SELECT distinct [Year],[MonthNumber],[Monthyear]
FROM [HWAIETV2DBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
ORDER BY [Year],[MonthNumber];
--END

exec sp_updatestats

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM EnrollmentTrendsState;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
--TRUNCATE the table and INSERT the data FROM main table
TRUNCATE table RoopaETPreData;
INSERT into RoopaETPreData
SELECT [State]
      ,[County]
,(CASE WHEN len(cast(Plan_ID as varchar(50)))='3' and left(cast(Plan_ID as varchar(50)),1)='8' THEN 'Group MA Plans' ELSE 'Individual MA Plans' END)IndGroupPlans,
(CASE WHEN ((LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='H' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'R')) AND [Offers_Part_D]='Yes' THEN 'MA-PD'
WHEN ((LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='H' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'R')) AND [Offers_Part_D]='No' THEN 'MA (without drugs)'
WHEN (LEFT([Contract_ID],1) ='E' or LEFT([Contract_ID],1) = 'S') THEN 'PDP' END) as MAPDP
      ,[Special_Needs_Plan_Type] as [SNP]
      ,[Plan_Type] as [PlanType]
      ,[Plan_Name] as [PlanName]
      ,[Key_Cp_Id] as [BidId]
      ,[Parent_Organization] as [OrganizationName]
      ,[Year]
      ,[Month] as [MonthName]
      ,[Enrollments]
      ,[ma_eligibles] as [MAEligibles]
      ,[Stability_Index] as [StabilityIndex]
	  --,'Yes' as [Prediction] 
      ,'No' as [Prediction] 
      ,[EGHP]
      ,[FIPS_State_County_Code]
      ,[Offers_Part_D]
      ,[Other Dual Full Medicaid Benefit] as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,[Plan_ID]
      ,[QDWI]
      ,[QI]
      ,[QMB only] as [QMB_Only]
      ,[QMB plus Full Medicaid Benefits] as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SLMB only] as [SLMB_only]
      ,[SLMB plus Full Medicaid Benefits] as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SNP_Eligibles]
      ,[SNP_Plan]
      ,[SSA_State_County_Code]
      ,[Contract_ID],null,null,null,null,null,null,null
	  ,[Status]
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[Trends_CW_withpredictions];
  
 
DELETE FROM RoopaETPreData WHERE monthname='';
  
UPDATE a SET  a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsOrganization b ON a.OrganizationName = b.OrganizationName;

--SELECT *  FROM RoopaETPreData where organizationid is null;

INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsOrganization
SELECT distinct OrganizationName FROM RoopaETPreData where organizationid is null
order by OrganizationName;

UPDATE a SET  a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsOrganization b ON a.OrganizationName = b.OrganizationName
where a.OrganizationID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.StateID=b.StateID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsState b ON a.State = b.State;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where stateid is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.CountyID=b.CountyID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsCounty b ON a.County = b.County;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where CountyID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsIndGroupPlans b ON a.IndGroupPlans = b.IndGroupPlans;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where IndGroupPlansID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.MAPDPID=b.MAPDPID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsMAPDP b ON a.MAPDP = b.MAPDP;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where MAPDPID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.SNPID=b.SNPID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSNP b ON a.SNP = b.SNP;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where SNPID is null;

UPDATE a SET  a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID
FROM RoopaETPreData a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsPlanType b ON a.PlanType = b.PlanType;

--SELECT * FROM RoopaETPreData where PlanTypeID is null;

--Get data for filters
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsFilters;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsFilters
SELECT distinct 
      [OrganizationID]
      ,[StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
 
 --get data for filters
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters
SELECT distinct 
      [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
  
--Get Data for EnrollmentTrendsData
TRUNCATE table EnrollmentTrendsData;
INSERT into EnrollmentTrendsData
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]  
	  ,[OrganizationID]
	  ,[PlanName]
      ,[BidId]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[Enrollments]
	  ,[MAEligibles]
      ,[StabilityIndex]
      ,[Prediction]
      ,[EGHP]
      ,[FIPS_State_County_Code]
      ,[Offers_Part_D]
      ,[Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,[Plan_ID]
      ,[QDWI]
      ,[QI]
      ,[QMB_Only]
      ,[QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SLMB_only]
      ,[SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,[SNP_Eligibles]
      ,[SNP_Plan]
      ,[SSA_State_County_Code]
      ,[Contract_ID],null,null
	  ,[Status]

  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].RoopaETPreData;
  
  
--alter table  [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData] add MonthNumber int
--alter table  [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData] add MonthYear int

update EnrollmentTrendsData set monthnumber=charindex(left([MonthName],3),'JAN FEB MAR APR MAY JUN JUL AUG SEP OCT NOV DEC')/4+1;
update EnrollmentTrendsData set monthyear=CONVERT(char(6), DATEFROMPARTS(year, monthnumber, 1), 112);

-- to replace 0 with nulls as it disturbs the average of eligibles
UPDATE EnrollmentTrendsData SET MAEligibles = CASE WHEN MAEligibles=0 THEN NULL ELSE MAEligibles END;

TRUNCATE table [ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction];
INSERT into [ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction]
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,null as FilterID
	  ,[Status]
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where prediction='No'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]
	  ,[Status]
	   order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction];

UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDFilterLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


INSERT into ETDFilterLevelWithPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,null as FilterID
	  ,[Status]
	  
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where prediction='Yes'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction]
	  ,[Status]
	   order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
      ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
      ,[Prediction];

	  UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDFilterLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;

	  /****** Script for SELECTTopNRows command FROM SSMS  ******/
TRUNCATE table ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction;
INSERT into ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,count(distinct BidId) as NoOfPlans,
	  null as FilterID,
	  null as SubFilterID
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where Prediction='No'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
	  order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
	  ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction];


UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.PKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsFilters b ON 
a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID and a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


UPDATE a SET  a.SubFilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithoutPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


INSERT into ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction
SELECT [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]	  
      ,Sum([Enrollments]) as [Enrollments]
      ,Avg([MAEligibles]) as [MAEligibles]
      ,Avg([StabilityIndex])  as [StabilityIndex]    
      ,Avg([Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit])    as [Other_Dual_Full_Medicaid_Benefit]
      ,Avg([QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits])   as [QMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]) as [SLMB_Plus_Full_Medicaid_Benefits]
      ,Avg([SNP_Eligibles])    as [SNP_Eligibles]  
	  ,count(distinct BidId) as NoOfPlans,
	  null as FilterID,
	  null as SubFilterID
  FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
  where Prediction='Yes'
  group by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
      ,[MonthName]
	  ,[MonthNumber]
      ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction]
	  order  by [StateID]
      ,[CountyID]
      ,[IndGroupPlansID]
      ,[MAPDPID]
      ,[SNPID]
      ,[PlanTypeID]
	  ,[OrganizationID]
      ,[Year]
	  ,[MonthYear]
	  ,[Prediction];


UPDATE a SET  a.FilterID=b.PKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsFilters b ON 
a.OrganizationID=b.OrganizationID and a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;


UPDATE a SET  a.SubFilterID=b.EnrollmentTrendsSubFiltersKey
FROM ETDOrganizationLevelWithPrediction a INNER JOIN EnrollmentTrendsSubFilters b ON 
a.StateID=b.StateID and
a.CountyID=b.CountyID and a.IndGroupPlansID=b.IndGroupPlansID and
a.MAPDPID =b.MAPDPID and a.SNPID=b.SNPID and a.PlanTypeID=b.PlanTypeID;



TRUNCATE table [ETDPlans];
INSERT into  [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[ETDPlans]
SELECT [MonthYear],[OrganizationID],count(distinct BidId) [NoOfplans]
FROM EnrollmentTrendsData 
GROUP BY [MonthYear],[OrganizationID];
	   
TRUNCATE table [EnrollmentTrendsMonthYear];
INSERT into [EnrollmentTrendsMonthYear]
SELECT distinct [Year],[MonthNumber],[Monthyear]
FROM [HWAIETDBTEST].[dbo].[EnrollmentTrendsData]
ORDER BY [Year],[MonthNumber];
--END

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM EnrollmentTrendsState;

source.sqlReaderQuery:

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Delete from Benefits_data where Benefits in ('orgtype','segment_id','version');

select Benefits from Benefits_data;

Update [dbo].[Benefits_data] set Year = (Select YEAR(GETDATE())+1);
 Select TOP (10) [Bid_Id] from Benefits_data;
